content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at work watching an area of clouds where the moon was shining through. 
2. i noticed a small sphere like object the same color as the moon and very bright move  eft to right through the clouds where there was a u like gap. 
3. i knew right away that it was not a air plane. i immediately thought off the ghost hunting shows where a bug would reflect light and look like a sphere.  
4.  the object appeared to be bright white. about the same color as the moon at the time. it moved quickly and did not come back as i watched and waited for the next 10 mins. the moon eventually was covered by clouds and there was no visible light. 
5. i was shocked and excited. i've been watching the skies at night for a long time at work and that was the first time i've spotted anything  out of the ordinary.
6. i only seen the object thanks to a u shape gap in the clouds. i lost sight after it cleared the opening.
content.summary: Cross between clouds. same color as moon.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to the gym around 5:30 am. i came to the stop sign at south of crow valley rd to make a left on willowdale rd. as i approached the stop sign i noticed lights about 100ft. hovering above the intersection. when i came to a complete stop i stared at the object trying to figure out what this was. i rolled the window down because i assumed man made but no sound was heard. i sat there for 5 minutes waiting for movement or some kind of sound. i couldn't figure it out so i slowly drove off. that event in my life i will always remember. i believe with 100% confidence it was a ufo. i don't advertise my experience but i have no doubts.
content.summary: Round disc like shape with circling lights on the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the dark, in my back yard, smoking a cigarette at my tall table facing ne. i saw a contained white ball of light come up from my east neighbors yard and move upward and at an angle. i could tell that it was on their side by the trees in the way. it disappeared into the heavier tree and i thought that since those neighbors porch lights were on that they may have been playing with a flashlight, but then i didn't see a beam of light at any time. then it came down from the heavy tree into and across my neighbors back yard that is directly across from me. his lights were on too and his dogs were out as mine was also and none of them barked. after it went across, it seemed to go upward at his fence line as to be going up the trees. then it disappeared for a second and then i saw a contained blue ball of light come down and appear to land in the next yard to the north which is vacant but i feel that it disappeared into the ground. i stood there looking for it to reappear but it never did but with buildings and trees in the area, it could have continued it's path without my seeing it. i looked in the sky for any strange object but best i could tell, there wasn't anything. 

without wanting to sound crazy, but how do i report with out sounding that way? a couple of weeks ago, i can't verify the exact date, but a contained white ball of light landed in my yard at night as i was standing in the same spot in the dark smoking a cigarette around 12-2 am. it became visual at eye level toward the east and went straight to the ground about 10 feet in front of me and disappeared. the next day i went to look for any signs of it and there were no visual signs. then tonights incident happens.

a couple of years ago, i was standing in my yard in the dark around 1 am again smoking a cigarette when i noticed a contained blue ball of light in my neighbors yard across from me. his lights were all out but his dogs have free access to go in and out of the house. they weren't barking but kept hitting the door as though pawing at it continuously while i watched this ball of light disappear, reappear, dart around throughout and up and down his back yard, even sitting still at times for thirty minutes before i gave up and went to bed, leaving it to do it's thing. i was extremely baffled by this ball of light.

i have no photo's as my cams can't seem to take photo's at night very well and nothing ever happens when i have one in my hands.
content.summary: Saw a contained ball of light moving through three neighbors yards

content.detailedDescription: My son told me to watch a large, unnaturally slow moving comet with a lot of smoke trailing it. the direction it headed was south. we first spotted it at about 7:25 pm in a store's parking lot. the comet was white and looked an inch wide and several inches long in the sky. during our drive home, he saw it change direction:  it took a sharp, roughly 90 degree turn south. we temporarily lost sight of it because of trees. when we sighted it again three minutes had passed and an orb of light began to luminesce behind it and continued for approximately three seconds until it was as bright as a brilliantly glowing white star. it was so bright my son thought it was a supernova because it was still broad daylight. about ten seconds later it dimmed in the same amount of time as it earlier luminesced. immediately after the light had faded away, my son said that he could just barely make out what appeared to him to be a circular, grey object from which the light came from. as if we weren't amazed enough, a second orb-light appeared in precisely the same manner:  in intensity of light, size, and the amount of time it lasted as the first one. while these events were occurring, one big plane and two small planes were trailing the orbs. while the second light was still glowing, it came perilously  near one of these aircraft, as if curious of its presence, before distancing very fast. at our house, we had a clear final view of the spectacle before it disappeared over the trees. we saw the comet being trailed by the orbs, which were now pulsating white yellow and a steady stream of aircraft following them.
content.summary: 4 planes trailing 2 bright white ufo's and 1 ufo with large trail of white smoke in back.

content.detailedDescription:
My work shift just ended and the blue angels were doing a practice run for the cleveland national airshow held over labor day weekend. i went outside to take a look.  i pulled out my phone to get some video of them, as they pass pretty close.  as i faced north waiting for them i noticed an object traveling north to south.  i thought airplane when i first seen it.  i then seen it stop and then continue.  chopper i then thought.  the distance and my eyesight didn't allow for a clear view. the object paused just for a second or two at least a couple of times before i started filming.  i picked up the video about half way of the time i viewed it. unfortunately i didn't know how to zoom in on my newer phone. the video going to the ground at the beginning was my attempt to find the zoom.  the object has a small pause in it's motion near the beginning and a longer pause near the end as it nears the building.  

there is no wow factor in this video, nor was i thinking, hey, a ufo.  as i watched it and ruled out airplane and chopper the only shape i could make out was square to rectangle.  the object appeared bigger in person than it does on video.  a drone of some sort was my only other thought but with the distance it traveled north to south a regular quadricopter used for gopro type video wouldn't have that range, i presume. i estimate the travel range that i observed north to south was 3 to 5 miles.

i stopped filming because of sun glare and assumed it wouldn't show up.  the video is shot facing west.  lakewood is about 5 miles in that direction.  the fact that mufon posted another video of a similar object in the same vicinity is the only reason i am submitting this one.  

within 30 seconds after i stopped filming the object that i can't identify, the blue angels were in my face and i hit record again.  i'm also including this clip so you can verify the time stamps.  i was facing north again but turned east to follow the angels.  the same building is at my back. it wasn't until after i went back inside that i realized a no fly zone was most likely in effect while the blue angels were in the air. 

here's hoping that you have some video software that may be able to help zoom in without much distortion.  the object appears very small on video and is just left of dead center at the beginning, moving to the left (south) in case your not seeing it. the audio sound is from machinery in the building behind me.  i'm not big on email so feel free to call me.
content.summary: Another slow moving ufo near lakewood, ohio during a blue angels practice run.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed and my husband, a former marine and now swat leader and lt. over investigations, came upstairs to tell me he had been observing what he believed to be a ufo. he told me that he had been watching the object for approximately 20 minutes. he came to get me at approximately 2220 hrs. he said that it caught his attention because it was very bright in the sky where we had never seen a star before. we live under flight paths for hartsfield jackson airport, but we have never observed a plane flying toward us directly from the west before. he thought maybe it was a plane anyway. he noticed as he continued to observe it that it never came nearer or distanced itself, as he thought it might have been a plane coming toward him. he noticed that with the naked eye, he could see red, green and yellow lights moving from right to left horizontally across the object. then the lights would pulsate one color at a time in no particular color pattern, but still only red, green and yellow. i came downstairs and observed the same as my husband. i watched it with the naked eye and binoculars for approximately 20 more minutes. at approximately 2245 i asked my husband to have my brother come outside so he could see it too. my brother came out, witnessing the same as my husband and i. we got out one of my husband's sniper spotting scopes and could see the same as before, but nothing was much clearer. it appeared that when the lights were in motion, they seemed to be moving around an object. when the lights pulsated, it seemed orb like, or rather the lights were larger. after observing a few more minutes, we noticed two planes that we assume we fighter jets because they were at an altitude of approximately 70,000 feet. they did not have a defined flight pattern as one flew under the object from north to south then banked east and flew east northeast over my residence. when wwe noticed the other plane, it was flying west southwest toward the object, also flying over my residence. when we noticed the two planes, the object started moving. it flew north (possibly north northwest due to it becoming dimmer) from its location. it took it approximately 2 minutes to get behind the treeline and exit my field of view. we watched the next night to see if maybe we were mistaken and maybe it was some sort of star, but we have not seen since, nor had ever seen before, anything like what we saw that night.
content.summary: Saw what thought was plane but didn't move over an hour. saw lights with and without binos. saw possible fighter jets then object flew off to nw.

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a solid bright white circular shaped object moving across the sky for abt 5 minutes.  as it got to abt power line level of my view, it faded out to black....As if if had a dimmer switch and slowly turned it down....No noise...No flashing lights like on an airplane.  moved to slow to be a meteorite. to pit it in perspective...Stand abt 3 feet from an incandescent light bulb...That's how it appeared moving away from me....No flashed....Just solid white light
content.summary: Ufo over homewood alabama

content.detailedDescription: 10 pm wed evening went out on my deck  for  a smoke before bed ..We live on the waters edge of lake simcoe, in ontario, oro medonte.  looking over the water there was a object that was bouncing up and down, was large enough to see and was low as a small plane flying low over the water - this was not a plane or chinese lantern.  it was bright redish colour coming towards us.  i got out my binocular and took a better look and appeared more clearish white colour.  it moved fairly quickly and like a ball of fire, as it moved towards us a tree was obstructing the view, so ran down onto the grass to continuing watching it and it disappear completely.
content.summary: Light was over lake simcoe ontario coming from sw  straight at us .Seemed fairly low  and  very bright .Was traveling towards us for about 5ish min

content.detailedDescription: I came in to work at 6pm and saw a bright yellow light behind some clouds in the sky. i assumed it was the sun until i looked to the left of the sky and saw a seperate bright yellow light behind clouds just as bright. then i thought the sun can't be in two places at once. then i thought was it even the sun at all. the clouds moved very slowly and light seemed to move with them. i observed until i had to go in to work. one light was on the left side of the parking lot and the other light was on the right side of the parking lot. i really want the pictures to be examined by professionals from different fields and i want to be notified by email as to what possible conclusions were drawn. i saw you all on a tv program and i'm thinking you all can examine these photos and give me an answer.
content.summary: Observed a bright yellow light behind two seperate clouds on opposite sides of the sky

content.detailedDescription: stepped outside this morning for a cig, sat in a spot where, in the dark i could see stars better. looked up and saw a boomarang shaped craft fly overhead. pretty low and fast. about a second and it was out of sight. no lights or sound. did anyone else see it&
content.summary: Witnessed a flyby

content.detailedDescription:
Coral castle ufo blog

my husband and i were touring the "coral castle" in homestead, fl with a handful of other people on 7/15/14. when i got home and reviewed the cell / smart phone pix, i then noticed the disk-looking object in the sky. i never saw it while taking those pictures. the picture taken a couple of seconds before (of tour guide) was not taken with hdf & there is no "object" in that photo with a very light sky color. the pic i have taken (again of same tour guide) with hdf shows a bluer sky and that strange oval / disk object. i have taken thousands of pix with cell phones and never, ever have i had something show up like that!!!

sadly, i just did not notice it (ufo / disk) until we returned home. i was amazed! i took nearly 80 photos and there is nothing odd in any of those shots! i sent both pix to family and friends and they, too, were truly stunned! i just wish it would have been seen at the time but it wasn't - unless anyone else on that tour took a pic at the same time in high def & in the same direction. there may be something easily explainable here since we were near the air force reserve facility (which was built after hurricane andrew in 1992). 

my 6 pix are taken in sequential order. the tour was around an hour & 10 minutes and then we went to the gift shop. i have pix of the time stamped receipts for entry for 2 people and 1 tee that was purchased, so i was able to pinpoint time at the coral castle.  the entry time was 3:51 pm est & 5:02 pm at the gift shop. the event had to take place in that time frame.
content.summary: Possible ufo seen on cell phone picture

content.detailedDescription: At first it was 3 stars that came down they told me that it was alexander grrrrrrrrdnk and my brothers [names removed/cms/dr] they also mentioned that i was special and that i would have a special power here on earth as soon as they left something weird happened some ghosts appeard told me that i needed to go down the street to my new home said thet my family was there but when i got there started to feel like i was in an elevator like someone was trying to hypnotize me then on the door in front of me a cartoon made of pencil appeard first it was three  people then to were killed then a pot appeared like a cannibal pot then the one guy starts  to put blood on his face then he starts to eat the blood then a picture of me dying and getting resurected appeard after that the people inside told me i needed to sign with my blood so i took out my swiss aemy knife but when i tried to cut myself nothing happened so i left then a week later object like the sun came down then it was dark but the sun came really fast like if they were controlling the time it was my father alexander because thats what he told me to call him he said that i had to leave with him or else it was going to be long and painfull i told him i couldnt because of my kids he clearly told me that i was going to get encarcerated and the process was going to be long and painfull and told me step by step what was going to happen to me and it did happen but before he left he saidthat he was go whole bunch of technology i said at the moment no because i didnt want it to be used in a bad way so he said i'd know when and also said since i stayed behind he said your turn to go up will be much later but while youre down here you are protector and your job is to protect everything around you then after that in back of the ship he sprayed some kind of fertilizer because i remember seeing the spray squirt out everywhere like something that had multiple colors then after that day i experienced that when i spoke to people i could tell them there whole life past present future i could even communicate with people thet had already past in both realms also the stars moved for me they still do i remember asking the stars questions and they answer yes or no i also recall two roosters coming next to me like if they were in a trance but they stood on my right side side by side and also let me pet them and also happened with these two vicious dogs like nothing walked side by side next to me and till this dayeverything i know feels great the me hearing peoples thoughts died little by little the good thing i can still read people and i'm also waiting to leave but till that day comes i listen and look up.
content.summary: First  3 stars that spoke to me then 5 days later ship like the sun wanted me to leave with him told them not yet they said pick me up later after that day could tell past present futureand also iq went up but little by little started to here less

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second submission to this site.  both events occurred in the same general time and area, in the mid-1990s near vandenberg afb.  they're the only two sky-related sightings i've ever seen, but a lot of other weird stuff happened around vafb in the 1990s (sounds, electrical/communications interference, etc).

for this event, i was sitting with five friends in a hot tub on the air force base itself (military housing).  it was probably around midnight, in late summer.  there were three girls and three boys present, ranging in age from 15 to 20.  it was a clear night, and we were looking up at the stars and talking.  one person noticed what looked like a star begin moving around in the sky, and pointed it out to the rest of us.  at first, we assumed it was a plane, but it didn't have the flashing strobe light on it, and it was spiraling around so erratically that it didn't seem possible that a human could be flying it.  we all stared at it, totally enthralled, trying to figure out what it could possibly be, and then it stopped moving and split in two.  we all gasped/screamed, but still kept watching.  

what had been one weird star was now two of them, and they began the crazy spiraling movements again, almost like they were dancing.  this went on for maybe another minute or so, and then one of them just vanished -- seemingly blinked out of existence -- followed immediately by the other one.  we all confirmed with each other that we had just seen what we thought we saw, and spent the rest of the night arguing over whether it was aliens, ball lightning, or some kind of super-secret military craft.  

the entire event lasted probably 5 minutes.  the objects didn't make any noise, and they weren't at all colorful.  they just looked like dancing stars.  i still have no idea what we saw that night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One star appeared to start moving erratically in the sky, then it split into two stars which danced around each other and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Last night me and a friend were on my roof watching the sunset and right after it set we noticed big "flocks" of very fast lights zipping all across the sky, we watched them dart all across the sky for about thirty minutes then they just stopped, my friend went home and i went to bed but i couldnt sleep so i just kept watching the sky. sure enough a big single light was slowly hovering above the city over from me and i saw hundreds if not thousands of these faint white lights fly in and out of the multicolored hovering light all night long, i went out to th e roof for a better view around five am. as things were starting to take on a morning glow i noticed the hovering craft start some sort of bright strobe light that lasted for a few minutes and all of the sudden a oval shape craft buzzed over me at about 100 feet. it was moving so fast that i barely saw it, the sound it gave of was like a deep rumble. it shot up into the sky and i lost it among all of the other ufos. then right as the sun came up the hovering ship just vanished, i didnt even see if it flew off, just one second it was there, the next it was gone. i promply went to the bathroom and threw up from the shock of seeing all of this. i didnt believe in aliens one bit before last night..In fact i didnt believe my own eyes for the first few hours of watching. i tried to get video but the lights were faint and my cell phone couldnt pick them up, but after watching the ogden utah sighting video from may 2014 i can say that those were th e same ufos i saw last night 9/4/2014. i know that my lack of video hardly makes this evidence but i know what i saw and after comparing to the recent sightings in houston texas and ogden utah i know those are the same things me and my friend saw.  seems the aliens are here..So cool.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I was just watching the stars with a friend when we saw a formation of ufos dart above us

content.detailedDescription:
This is going back nearly 20 years, but i will never forget it.  it was the summer of 1996 or 1997.  it was a warm evening, and my best friend (male, age 15/16) and i (female, age 15/16) were lying on our backs on his backyard trampoline, looking up at the stars and talking.  as we talked, i noticed what i assumed to be a satellite -- a small, star-like object traveling silently at a constant, slow rate of speed across the night sky.  i pointed it out to him, and he saw it, too.  then we noticed another identical one nearby traveling at the same rate of speed.  "wow, two of them, what are the odds?" was our reaction, until we quickly noticed a third identical light, and that all three lights were moving in formation as a perfect equilateral triangle.  

just as we were commenting on how weird that was, we noticed that as the three lights passed across the sky, the "triangle" they formed blocked our view of the stars between them.  that's when we realized it was a single solid object, not three satellites.  we both became terrified and ran inside his house to get away from it.  

i have no idea how high up it was, but since the lights looked like little satellites, i think it was pretty high up.  if so, it had to be huge -- maybe hundreds of feet across.  it made no sound and was traveling north-by-northeast in a straight line at a constant, slow rate of speed.  i think that if we had stayed outside to watch it, it could have taken at least five or ten minutes to pass out of our range of view.  we lived right next to vandenberg afb, and in the years since the incident, i have come to believe that what we saw was an advanced, "skunk works"-type aircraft on a test flight.  at the time, however, it scared the crap out of us.
content.summary: Three lights in a triangle formation passed silently overhead, blocking out stars in between.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from betting a breakfast burrito from alberto's on hammer ln.I noticed a con trail and a bright light hovering i the sky. got home got my nephew up to see it to and started to record with my phone couldn't record the smaller lights that appeared the disappeared and reappeared. but a larger light appeared and descended into the cloud as the others did the one ufo made a con trail for a short distance downward and then fighter jets come with there afterburners on the off then on and headed straight toward the cloud. then some of the disappeared and the other left a curved contrail it left fast....Unbelievable
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Multiple ufos lest one biggest all flew into cloud disappeared and then reappeared.. jest chased cam from different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was outside last night looking at the sky as i have a clear view of the night sky here in the mountains of virginia. these two jets caught my eye flying around then i saw a bright yellow glowing aircraft it made very high speed maneuvers around big a mountain it was flying without making any noise when the aircraft moved the yellow light intensified then turned blue and moved about 6 or 7 miles in a split second the whole time there was 2 obviously military jets flying around trying to keep up with it or something the aircraft can hover in one spot too!!! i observed this happening for about 2 hours! i think the aircraft is definitely something the government has but how can a human survive the g force to move that fast?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I observed an aircraft that was flying around big a mountain the elevation is 3700 feet on top the aircraft moved silently

content.detailedDescription: It was shaped like a boomarang had 4x8 feet lights inside and outside of each angle clearest lights ever seen one nose light nothing flashing maybe 50 miles an hour or less 8 to 10 lightson each slope. vehicles were 1000 feet apart. no blimp . it had wing spans of 100 feet  and 100 feet at end of triangle . im a vietnam veteran saw all types of aircraft nothing like this
content.summary: Flew directly over my head at 12.22 am slow moving 300 feet apart

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was sky watching at the time from my bedroom window.I was scouting in the south west skies,to north.I noticed a ball of energy,much like an explosion,in the west skies a few hundred feet off ground level and at a distance of approx a few miles at most.This was followed within seconds by another exact "explosion" which then merged with the former.It was becoming bigger & brighter,then from its right hand-side protruded a burst of fire/light/energy which eventually formed a yellow/orange crescent in the sky with a number of points of energy along its length,like yellow stars.I would guess at between 7&9 points.Then each of these points of energy seemed to "pop" in sequence until they had all disintegrated soon followed by the original source until the skies were clear.This lasted for about 30 seconds in all.
about 20 minutes later i spotted two orange,crown green bowling ball shape,objects very high in the sky,guessing at 10k feet,travelling from south to north west at a slow speed and in tandem. this was then followed by a bright white object travelling much faster but in the opposite direction,at similar altitude but with an erratic flight path,as if it was constantly changing altitudes,up/down during travel.
around midnight is when i noticed a blue light descending very fast in the s/w skies around a mile or so away from me.This blue object was flying in a zig zag path just above the trees/houses straight towards me.It got to within 100 yards from me,slightly paused on the turn & shot off up the adjacent road at tremendous speed!.This was followed by a larger blue object descending from the skies at a slower speed than the first & in a weaving path as opposed to a zigzag path.But this time "it" glided right over my house at a altitude which was no more than 25feet above my position,which was by this time actually hanging out my window with my camera in hand,& at a speed of approx 50kph.On closer inspection i found it was larger because it was two objects flying side by side,but one slightly higher than the other.They were approx 15ft wide by 3ft,12inches deep & of a rectangular shape,a black matt body with blue lights around the edges top & bottom.As it flew by i could hear it slicing the air & actually felt the air stream against my face!! by this time my heart was pounding & i was full of frustration that i was alone. soon,another one appeared which followed the same path as the first blue object.It got within 50 yards of me & flew off in the same direction as the first at the same speed.I then after a minute or so decided to go & see if i could see where the two objects where at the front of my house.I then witnessed the two objects returning from the east gliding at approx 50kph at an altitude of 50 ft above the houses.It was one of the most amazing but frustrating times of my life as i had no one their to witness it with me,but quickly phoned my son to tell him what i had just seen,just in case they came back for me.The videos i am sending are of very poor quality unfortunately.In the first video the crescent is to be found above the bathroom light in the house.In the second video the two blue objects flew towards me,but as i say its poor
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: The event was extremely varied from an anomaly in the sky which formed from two

content.detailedDescription:
My wife & i were just sitting down to watch tv before retiring to bed. we had sit down & turned off all the lights so all that was on was the tv, all of a sudden the entire room was lit up just for a few seconds. we both looked at each other & got up and went to the north side windows. there was nothing out there. my husband grabbed his shotgun & went outside to look around. he found no one & saw nothing to report. 
very strange, never had anything like that to happen before.
content.summary: {dr)we were sitting in our living room & all of a sudden the entire room was lit up with a bright brilliant flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 of my friends when we where young (12 years of age) witnessed several alien looking beings walking down a dark suburban sidewalk temporarily becoming exposed under a street light as they walked past. they startled all of us but we did not appear to impact them especially myself and my friend steve r. who were directly across from them. they continued along the sidewalk and turned northwest right past the other two witnesses who were hiding behind bushes from steve and myself. when they passed us, steve and i took off running to the one witnesses home (i don't think to this day have i ever ran so fast). shortly after that the other two witnesses came running to the same house and saw us hiding behind a yellow station wagon. we all were looking at each other and said did you see that what the heck was that? we if i recall correctly mentioned it to dale's mom i am not certain, it has been a little while but i remember exactly what they looked like and where it happened (if we did mention it obviously no one believed us). i shortly after the incident moved away for roughly 36 years but have seen all 3 of the others since i moved back only briefly. i mentioned to them do you remember when we where young and bam they all said yes, still getting the what was that response, we never had a chance to discuss any details since we met only briefly. i have looked for steve since then because he and i seen more than the other two (hiding) but have been unable to locate him. i know some details that only steve would know that is why i have tried to find him i wanted to talk with him more in depth just for my own curiosities sake. these entities looked almost human but different i am certain what i saw and it was not halloween. why wait so long before mentioning it to others i have not waited i have told people about this for many years who believes, who does not, i do not have a clue, but i know what i saw, nasa is close but they where not from the earth astronauts.
content.summary: Walking

content.detailedDescription: My nephew (who was about 5 at the time) and i were having a rare moment where neither of us were engaged in any activity. it was amber outside, full cloud coverage, a barometric pressure that indicated it would rain at any moment; it was warm, so the doors were open. i suppose perhaps we were standing at the door, waiting for the rain to come--a stillness all around that you can't help but sense. my peripheral vision picked up movement on my left. i turned my head by a mere quarter turn- noting as i did so, that my nephew picked up on the same movement and turned as well. we both stood motionless and silent on the top step, watching as it drifted perfectly parallel to the top of my mother's chain link fence. my initial impression was a drifting balloon but it didn't have the shape or tendencies. a balloon ascends or descends, and is affected by air current. this object was on an even, straight plane and didn't move to the right, nor to the left, not up or down. my initial response was merely to watch. i could tell if i ran after it, i wouldn't catch it, as it was about 25 feet or more from me, seven to nine feet off the ground and going steadily about three or maybe five mph. the object did not look large, and every time i think of it, i am reminded of a stingray. that is what i thought then, it is what i still think now - a stiff stingray without a tail. aside from knowing i could never catch it, i also did not want to leave my nephew on the steps or lead him into the yard where either of us might have gotten hurt. never picking up or dropping speed, making a sound or straying from its straight path, it went across the street and into the sparce trees. we watched silently until it was no longer visible. my nephew then said, "tia (place my birthname here), what was that?" i recall thinking how gently he asked, how calmly we observed this anomaly, how peaceful i felt even as i was filled with awe and wonder. all i said to my nephew was, "i've never seen that before, sweetie". it seems the second i finished my sentence, the rain began to fall in buckets. i have since then asked my nephew, who is now 14 years old, if he recalls the day/event. it is a vague memory to him. his mother got home maybe an hour later, and we told her about it. these sort of things are not particularly her cup of tea, i could tell the subject made her uncomfortable. when i first asked my nephew if he recalled it (a couple of years later), he said she did not like him to talk about it. she specifically told me she did not want him to talk about it-- she wanted him to forget it. i am certain it is because she doesn't want her child to be viewed as a weirdo and then be given a hard time as a result. i have often thought of going under hypnosis to record the event more precisely than i just have. i've considered that it might have been a man-made object, a creature that, like sasquatch, potentially exists yet has never been formally encountered by humans before, or that it is extraterrestrial in origin. if there was a life form inside, it would have to be no larger than a barbie doll. if there was more than one, they'd have to be the size of the little plastic army men. was it a drone, collecting data? so many possibilities. i have often watched ufo-related shows and videos, hoping to hear of an object like this one but have yet to hear of anything even remotely similar.
content.summary: 5year old nephew & i standing my mother's porch. absolutely silent/still outside; from the corner of my eye, i detected movement. we both turned & watched as it, without sound or visible means of propulsion, made its way across the street @3mph

content.detailedDescription: I observed a hovering object in the western sky of upper bucks county, pa, shortly after 10pm while taking out the trash. my first thought was that i was witnessing a very bright star. however, i immediately realized that the object was much larger than any star or planet (much larger than jupiter) and was pulsating extremely bright, vivid, and varied colors. the object three dimensional and appeared top be pyramid or diamond shaped. the object flashed randomly in intense red, orange, blue, green, yellow, and white. as a licensed pilot i immediately recognized that these are not standard aviation colors. the object was fairly fay away, probably a few miles away. i ruled out a standard aircraft because the object hovered for about 30 minutes before moving very slowly in a west/northwest direction. the object did not appear to be a helicopter due to the apparent large size of the object, the intensity of the lighting, and the multicolor display that were atypical of faa approved lighting. although i could not rule out a blimp, i thought that it would need to be a very large blimp such as the type that might float over sport stadiums. given that there are no large sport stadiums in upper bucks county, i thought that it would be very odd for a blimp to be floating in the sky late at night on a work night. my family and i viewed the object through binoculars. i was impressed with the beauty of the light display.
content.summary: Observed to the west of my house at night. my wife and two teenage children also witnessed object.

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were outside of our garage, talking with our neighbor, when my partner pointed to the sky and asked me, "what the hell is that?"  hovering just below the clouds, we observed a large solid black triangle, just hovering...  no sound at all.  it looked as though it may have had a round light, or dome in the center.  we all had the distinct feeling it was watching us.  it remained totally motionless...  no movement at all.  no visible means of any propulsion.  a thunder storm was just beginning to develop and we were worried that the craft may get hit by lightning but it did not...  it also continued to remain silent and motionless as the winds picked up.  after about 15-20 minutes, the craft began to move slowly and silently, in a westerly direction, until it disappeared from view.  still totally silent.
content.summary: Large black triangle hovering just below clouds over garage - no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around my neighborhood with my family when i looked up and saw 3 bright fire balls all in a line 1 behind the other, the last moving just a little slower than the first 2. the kept one directional path from north to south but it seemed they were going higher towards space. they seemed to be followed by 4 air craft that looked more like extra high flying planes. 2 had blinking red lights and the others had bluish blinking lights. one by one they got to what looked to be our atmospheric line and disappeared. shortly thereafter the trailing aircrafts changed course and went back to the north. i'm always looking into the night sky and this was a first for me and my family. none of us has ever encountered a sight like that. to add to the experience, just last night my mother and i saw another one, just one,  coming in from the east and behaving the same as the other 3. there were no aircraft following this 1 and it looked to be at a much higher altitude, disappearing just the same.
content.summary: 3 fire balls silently flying from north towards space

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 7, i was camping with a very dear friend of mine near boreas pass, about 20 miles northwest of fairplay, colorado and about 7 miles west of the tiny town of como. we were camped near a high alpine meadow at 10,400 ft, just below the summit of boreas peak. as we were having dinner, we noticed a bright amber-colored light moving across the sky in a straight line. this would have been nothing unusual (indeed, we both initially assumed it was a satellite or high-altitude plane), except that at one point, it grew much brighter...And then, a few seconds later, much dimmer again (though still clearly visible). we both said to each other, "that was weird...," but were still ready to write the whole thing off. 

about 20-30 minutes later, we went out for a late-night stroll in the meadow under the moonlight. we were just about to head back to camp & go to bed when my friend shouted, "hey! look over there!" and pointed in the direction of boreas peak (roughly westward). just above the top of the mountain (at least from our perspective) was an amber light like the one we'd seen before, only brighter and closer. and instead of moving in a straight line, it zig-zagged around in all directions: up and down, left and right, and not at a constant speed either. it actually appeared to be following the line of the mountain. at one point, it stopped completely in its tracks, flashed very brightly for a few seconds, and then darted off to the right (northward) at a tremendous speed. shortly after (within 15 minutes), we saw two airplanes that appeared to be military jets pass over the same mountaintop. these were clearly distinguishable from the commercial jets passing overhead on their way to denver.

i had always been curious about ufos, but still skeptical. "i'll believe it when i see one" was always my mantra. well, this was the point at which my perspective shifted: i have now seen a ufo with my own eyes, something i cannot rationally explain. it might be aliens, it might be something of ours, it might be "earth lights," but whatever it was, i have no earthly idea!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Amber-colored light moving erratically, pausing & pulsing brightly, then taking off at very high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Just happen to start videoing again this past month noticed things going by at night shooting stars, drone's flying above the airliners from time to time.
anyway around 9pm in my back yard videoing the moon.  this bright light coming from the south/east at about 75 deg. just under the moon catches me off guard as it goes very fast up just under the moon i tryed to follow it up past the moon but it was to fast. it was cool to watch it replay on my hd video cam...
content.summary: Videoing  the moon then this bright missile like thing goes zooming up passing the moon.

content.detailedDescription:
I stopped on my moped in front of packer's market on central street in franklin, nh. i had stopped because people were setting off fireworks down by the river, across the river from where we stood (fireworks were independently done as franklin has no displays yearly). there was a woman and her white mixed pit breed that was already stopped there. we commented to each other how this was amazing that no cops were stopping by to stop the fireworks and how professional some of them looked. then the object appeared in the area of the track and football practice field of the high school. it hovered for minutes then started moving in different directions and then returning to its original spot over what is the track and football practice field for the high school. the only lights it had were green that flashed, sometimes consecutively, then intermittently, then stopping. 

when a group of fireworks ended, the object started to fly off then completely disappeared. then it reappeared and started descending to the ground. when it landed i asked the woman if she saw what i saw. she said yes but she didn't want to say anything because maybe her eyes were deceiving her or maybe i would think she was crazy if i didn't see it. we both said what we saw and our descriptions were identical. suddenly, it ascended straight up far into the air and i said we should take pictures. i was able to videotape it for 22 seconds before it left. on the videotape all i can see is a flashing dot (it is a phone camera). i don't know how to zoom in to see it clearer. when it disappeared the last time, we both decided to leave the area as we were a little fearful about staying when we were the only women and only people there on the street and in the area. we didn't go down to the field either as we were both afraid as it was very dark in that area.

this was not reported earlier because i didn't know who to report it to. i saw an article tonight (wednesday night) so i am reporting it now.

i don't have another email or a cell phone to report to you (i keep my cell # private.)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was disc shaped, flashed a green light intermittently as in vodeo but sometimes it disappeared then would reappear seconds later

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking around 11 pm. i was looking up at the stars as i enjoy them. i caught site of a couple planes. and was watching them move. i then noticed this flashing star like orb. it was just obover the tree tops. similar height of a distant plane. i noticed right away it was odd. it was flashing white blue redish orange looked like maybe some green or purple. i called for my spouse, and after watching it for a while, we realized it was was not moving or barely moving. we watched it for about 15 minutes. we both thought it was strange. went inside. half an hour later i went out to check on it. it was gone. and i counted 7 planes flying in what seemed to be in an order in a line over the area i had seen the object. i did research after i had first seen it. i was leaning toward a star. but when i went out 30 mins later it was gone. i felt a little weird. and the fact of counting 7 planes in the area made it seem even more strange. i have never seen anything like this before in my life. if there is anyway you could get back to me if you find anything or know what it is i had seen it would be nice if i could be contacted...If that is possible. thank you.
content.summary: Stationary flashing star like orb.

content.detailedDescription: 3 glowing orange orbs hovering over west twin falls/ filer area. at about 9;45 pm 9/3/2014  they flickered, disappeared, reappeared only to disappear again. they were closly alligned and all at the same altitute.
content.summary: 3 glowing orange orbs in a line
